screens.name: Project
screens.description: Project setup for a song

screens.name: MIDI Mappings
screens.description: Configures mappings of incoming (through USB, TRS or internal MIDI) messages

screens.name: MIDI Settings
screens.description: Configures general MIDI settings

screens.name: File Browser
screens.description: Loads a projects, samples and instrument

screens.name: Modulators
screens.description: Configures modulators for an instrument

screens.name: Song
screens.description: Song screen

screens.name: Chain
screens.description: Stringing together phrases into a bar

screens.name: Phrase
screens.description: Phrase screen

screens.name: Table
screens.description: Instrument or AUX tables add instrument controls per instrument or track

screens.name: Groove
screens.description: Sets the tick count per step of a phrase

screens.name: Scale
screens.description: Sets the root scale, which changes how the sequencer applies notes to a TSP enabled instrument

screens.name: Instrument
screens.description: Configures an instrument, here: a sampler

screens.name: Modulators
screens.description: Configures modulators for an instrument

screens.name: Sample Editor
screens.description: Changes, cuts or slices a sample to save it on the SD card.

screens.name: FX Settings
screens.description: Setting equalizer per FX, per instrument or for the entire mix

screens.name: Mixer
screens.description: Mixer for individual channels, incoming audio and audio fx, limiter and OTT.

screens.name: Limiter & Mix Scope
screens.description: Limiter scope shows the loudness dampening of the current audio loudness

screens.name: Equalizer
screens.description: Setting equalizer per FX, per instrument or for the entire mix

screens.name: System Settings
screens.description: Various configurations of the M8

screens.name: Theme
screens.description: Sets the color theme of the M8

screens.name: Time Stats
screens.description: Shows misc time statistics (time does not advance when the device is turned off)

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.name: Continue song
activities.description: Continues song at the cursor position.

activities.name: Mute Track
activities.description: Mute current track - if you release option first, holds the mute

activities.name: Solo Track
activities.description: Solo current track, release option first to hold the solo.

activities.name: Clear mutes and solos
activities.description: Clears all mute and solos that are being held by any track.

activities.name: Edit in small increments
activities.description: Edits a all values (notes, volume, instrument, fx command and fx value) in small increments.

activities.name: Edit in large increments
activities.description: Edits a volume, instrument number or FX value in large increments (16 steps, the left, most significant byte)

activities.name: Set default value
activities.description: Sets the default value for the highlighted setting

activities.name: Name Project
activities.description: Naming the Project by holding edit, navigating to the letter and releasing the edit key.

activities.name: Create Snapshot
activities.description: Creates a song snapshot for temporarily storing the entire song to recall at a later point.

activities.name: Recall Snapshot
activities.description: Recall the song snapshot previously created.

activities.name: Assign MIDI CC to Tempo
activities.description: Assign a MIDI CC to a selected parameter

activities.name: Assign Touch-Axis as MIDI to Tempo
activities.description: Assign the touchscreen axis to the selected parameter on any value with a visual slider. This can be leveraged to create assignments, that can be reassigned for internal MIDI.

activities.name: Navigate next/prev
activities.description: Navigates to the next or previous entry

activities.name: Skip over 8 entries
activities.description: Skips over 8 entries in the list

activities.name: Go to top / bottom
activities.description: Navigates immediately to the top or bottom of the screen

activities.name: Sort directory
activities.description: Sorts the directory in lexographic order (by incrementing number and alphabet)

activities.name: Preview
activities.description: Previews the song

activities.name: Exit
activities.description: Exits the file browser

activities.name: Delete
activities.description: Deletes the highlighted file

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor on the screen

activities.name: Move 16 Rows
activities.description: Moves / scrolls the cursor 16 rows up or down

activities.name: Insert New
activities.description: Inserts a new value into an empty cell (--). The value is either the default value (00) or the last picked, edited or deleted value

activities.name: Edit in large increments
activities.description: Edits a value in large increments (16 steps, the left, most significant byte)

activities.name: Edit in small increments
activities.description: Edits a value in small increments (1 step)

activities.name: Edit multiple selections
activities.description: Edits the current selection by incrementing or decrementing the value by one. Only works when a single row is selected.

activities.name: Enter Selection Mode
activities.description: Enters Selection mode, which then can be expanded by using the directional keys

activities.name: Move selection up / down
activities.description: Moves the selection up or down

activities.name: Copy
activities.description: When one or more values are selected, copies the selection into the clipboard

activities.name: Cut
activities.description: Cuts out the value on the cursor or the entire selection. Note: This moves the rows after the value or selection.

activities.name: Paste
activities.description: When there are values in the clipboard, paste the selection. Note: this moves the affected rows down in the song view.

activities.name: Clone selection
activities.description: Clones the selected chains into new chains, keeping the phrase numbers.

activities.name: Deep clone selection
activities.description: Deep clones the selected chains into new chains, copying the phrases contained into new phrases.

activities.name: Move Track
activities.description: If the cursor is on Row 00, enters into track reordering mode, which allows to swap all chains of one track with another track. Can be exited with [DOWN]

activities.name: Play
activities.description: Plays / stops all tracks. When in Live Mode, the current selection will be queued.

activities.name: Loop Selection with Track
activities.description: Loops the selected chains with the remaining tracks looping the same chains.

activities.name: Cue Row
activities.description: Cue the selected song row for playback, regardless of Live Mode.

activities.name: Solo tracks to the left / right
activities.description: Solo all tracks to the left or right side of the cursor's position.

activities.name: Mute current track
activities.description: Mutes the current track. If you release option first, then you keep the track muted (or remove the mute, if it was being held).

activities.name: Solo current track
activities.description: Solos the current track. If you release option first, then you keep the track solo (or remove the solo, if it was being held).

activities.name: Clear all mute and solos
activities.description: Clears all mute and solos that are being held by any track.

activities.name: Live Mode
activities.description: Enters and exists into live mode. Live mode allows playing, cueing or stopping each track independently and from anywhere in the song structure. When a track is cued for playback via pressing [PLAY] the sequencer will wait for the currently playing chain to finish before activating the newly cued chain by default. You can change this behavior on the Project View under "Live Quantize".

activities.name: Bookmark
activities.description: Bookmarks the chain at the cursor. If the chain is already bookmarked, removes the bookmark.

activities.name: Render selection
activities.description: Only when playback is stopped, allows the selected chains to be quickly rendered into a new instrument.

activities.name: Show Track Time
activities.description: Shows the track time of that song island to the cursor. This only works when the song is currently not playing

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.name: Next / prev chain
activities.description: Navigates to previous or next chain in the song

activities.name: Next / prev track
activities.description: Navigates to previous or next track

activities.name: Play
activities.description: Plays / stops the current track without the other tracks.

activities.name: Continue song
activities.description: Continues song at the cursor position with the other tracks.

activities.name: Loop Selection
activities.description: When a few chains are currently selected, loops these chains.

activities.name: Loop Selection with Track
activities.description: Loops the selected chains with the remaining tracks looping the same chains.

activities.name: Mute Track
activities.description: Mute current track - if you release option first, holds the mute

activities.name: Solo Track
activities.description: Solo current track, release option first to hold the solo.

activities.name: Clear mutes and solos
activities.description: Clears all mute and solos that are being held by any track.

activities.name: Insert New
activities.description: Inserts a new value into an empty cell (--). The value is either the default value (00) or the last picked, edited or deleted value

activities.name: Edit in small increments
activities.description: Edits the value at the cursor position by one step.

activities.name: Edit in large increments
activities.description: Edits a value at the cursor position in large steps.

activities.name: Insert unused Phrase
activities.description: Inserts a new, unused phrase into the current cell.

activities.name: Cut
activities.description: Cuts out the value on the cursor or the entire selection.

activities.name: Enter Selection Mode
activities.description: Enters Selection mode, which then can be expanded by using the directional keys

activities.name: Copy
activities.description: When one or more values are selected, copies the selection into the clipboard

activities.name: Paste
activities.description: The copied instrument is pasted into the current instrument slot. Release both buttons and repeat to undo.

activities.name: Clone selection
activities.description: Clones the selected chains into new chains, keeping the phrase numbers.

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.name: Next / prev phrase
activities.description: Navigates to previous or next phrase in the song. The triangle on the side indicates which phrase of a chain it is.

activities.name: Next / prev track
activities.description: Navigates to previous or next track

activities.name: Play
activities.description: Starts / stops playing phrase at current cursor position, repeats the same phrase endlessly.

activities.name: Continue song
activities.description: Continues song at the cursor position.

activities.name: Loop Selection
activities.description: When a few steps are currently selected, loops that selection.

activities.name: Loop Selection with Track
activities.description: Loops the selected steps with the remaining tracks looping the same steps.

activities.name: Mute Track
activities.description: Mute current track - if you release option first, holds the mute

activities.name: Solo Track
activities.description: Solo current track, release option first to hold the solo.

activities.name: Clear mutes and solos
activities.description: Clears all mute and solos that are being held by any track.

activities.name: Insert New
activities.description: Inserts a new value into an empty cell (--). The value is either the default value (00) or the last picked, edited or deleted value

activities.name: Edit in large increments
activities.description: Edits a volume, instrument number or FX value in large increments (16 steps, the left, most significant byte)

activities.name: Edit Octave
activities.description: With the cursor on the note, changes the octave on the note.

activities.name: Edit in small increments
activities.description: Edits a all values (notes, volume, instrument, fx command and fx value) in small increments.

activities.name: Edit Note
activities.description: With the cursor on the note, changes the note based on the scale of that track.

activities.name: Show FX Help
activities.description: With the cursor on an FX row, shows the effect help and sections.

activities.name: Assign new Instrument
activities.description: When the cursor is on an instrument row or the NXT command, assigns a new instrument with an unused slot.

activities.name: Assign new Table
activities.description: When the cursor is on an FX Value of TBL, TBX, GRV or GGR, assigns an unassigned table number.

activities.name: Clone selection
activities.description: When the cursor is on an instrument value, instrument command value (NXT) or a table command (TBL, TBX, GRV, GGR) value, clones the instrument or table into an unassigned instrument or table.

activities.name: Enter Selection Mode
activities.description: Enters Selection mode, which then can be expanded by using the directional keys

activities.name: Copy
activities.description: When one or more values are selected, copies the selection into the clipboard

activities.name: Cut
activities.description: Cuts out the value on the cursor or the entire selection.

activities.name: Paste
activities.description: When there are values in the clipboard, paste the selection and overwrites values.

activities.name: Shift Selection
activities.description: Shifts the selection up or down.

activities.name: Fill Notes
activities.description: When the selection includes notes, fills the selection with notes.

activities.name: Randomize Notes
activities.description: When the selection includes notes, randomizes the note value up or down.

activities.name: Randomize Pattern
activities.description: When the selection includes notes, randomizes note triggers.

activities.name: Interpolate Values
activities.description: With a column of values selected, interpolate the values from the first to last selection. This works for FX, but only when row has the same FX command inserted.

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.name: Next / prev 16 Tables
activities.description: Moves 16 tables at a time.

activities.name: Next / prev table
activities.description: Navigates to previous or next table

activities.name: Play
activities.description: Starts / stops playing phrase, repeats the same phrase endlessly.

activities.name: Continue song
activities.description: Continues song at the cursor position.

activities.name: Mute Track
activities.description: Mute current track - if you release option first, holds the mute

activities.name: Solo Track
activities.description: Solo current track, release option first to hold the solo.

activities.name: Clear mutes and solos
activities.description: Clears all mute and solos that are being held by any track.

activities.name: Assign new Table
activities.description: When the cursor is on an FX Value of TBL, TBX, GRV or GGR, assigns an unassigned table number.

activities.name: Clone selection
activities.description: When the cursor is on an instrument command (NXT) value or a table command (TBL, TBX, GRV, GGR) value, clones the instrument or table into an unassigned instrument or table.

activities.name: Enter Selection Mode
activities.description: Enters Selection mode, which then can be expanded by using the directional keys

activities.name: Copy
activities.description: When one or more values are selected, copies the selection into the clipboard

activities.name: Cut
activities.description: Cuts out the value on the cursor or the entire selection.

activities.name: Paste
activities.description: When there are values in the clipboard, paste the selection and overwrites values.

activities.description: Shifts the selection up or down.

activities.name: Interpolate Values

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.name: Next / prev 16 Grooves
activities.description: Moves 16 grooves at a time.

activities.name: Next / prev groove
activities.description: Navigates to previous or next groove

activities.name: Play
activities.description: Plays / stops the current track without the other tracks.

activities.name: Continue song
activities.description: Continues song at the cursor position with the other tracks.

activities.name: Mute Track
activities.description: Mute current track - if you release option first, holds the mute

activities.name: Solo Track
activities.description: Solo current track, release option first to hold the solo.

activities.name: Clear mutes and solos
activities.description: Clears all mute and solos that are being held by any track.

activities.name: Insert New
activities.description: Inserts a new value into an empty cell (--). The value is either the default value (00) or the last picked, edited or deleted value

activities.name: Edit in small increments
activities.description: Edits the value at the cursor position by one step.

activities.name: Change value with adjacent entry
activities.description: Increments or decrements the current value with the next adjacent value, keeping the total tick number even. This helps in making swings without increasing the total ticks of a groove.

activities.name: Edit multiple values
activities.description: Increments or decrements the selection

activities.name: Edit multiple values in large steps
activities.description: Increments or decrements the selection in large (16) steps

activities.name: Enter Selection Mode
activities.description: Enters Selection mode, which then can be expanded by using the directional keys

activities.name: Copy
activities.description: When one or more values are selected, copies the selection into the clipboard

activities.name: Cut
activities.description: Cuts out the value on the cursor or the entire selection.

activities.name: Paste
activities.description: The copied instrument is pasted into the current instrument slot. Release both buttons and repeat to undo.

activities.name: Interpolate Values
activities.description: With a column of values selected, interpolate the values from the first to last selection. This works for FX, but only when row has the same FX command inserted.

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.name: Next / prev scale
activities.description: Navigates to previous or next scale

activities.name: First / last scale
activities.description: Moves to the first or last groove

activities.name: Change Root Key
activities.description: When the key-entry is selected, offsets the root key to the desired note

activities.name: Enable Key
activities.description: When the cursor is on the enable column, enables or disables the key of that row

activities.name: Edit in small increments
activities.description: Edits an instrument parameter in small steps.

activities.name: Edit in large increments
activities.description: Edits an instrument parameter in large steps (16 steps, the left, most significant byte)

activities.name: Name Scale
activities.description: Naming the scale by holding edit, navigating to the letter and releasing the edit key.

activities.name: Navigate
activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.name: Next / prev instrument
activities.description: Goes to the next or previous instrument

activities.name: Quick next / prev instrument
activities.description: Steps in large increments to the next instrument (16 instruments)

activities.name: Play
activities.description: Plays / stops the current track without the other tracks.

activities.name: Continue song
activities.description: Continues song at the cursor position with the other tracks.

activities.name: Mute Track
activities.description: Mute current track - if you release option first, holds the mute

activities.name: Solo Track
activities.description: Solo current track, release option first to hold the solo.

activities.name: Clear mutes and solos
activities.description: Clears all mute and solos that are being held by any track.

activities.name: Preview Instrument
activities.description: Previews the instrument by triggering it once and keeping it on until either key is released.

activities.name: Edit in large increments
activities.description: Edits a value at the cursor position in large steps.

activities.name: Edit in small increments
activities.description: Edits the value at the cursor position by one step.

activities.name: Edit with touchscreen
activities.description: Edits the selected parameter by horizontal sliding

activities.name: Set default value
activities.description: Sets the default value for the highlighted setting

activities.name: Copy
activities.description: When one or more values are selected, copies the selection into the clipboard

activities.name: Paste
activities.description: The copied instrument is pasted into the current instrument slot. Release both buttons and repeat to undo.

activities.name: Undo Paste
activities.description: The pasted instrument can be reverted back by releasing both keys and doing the same combination.

activities.name: Randomize Instrument
activities.description: Randomizes all parameters of the instrument

activities.name: Change FM Algo
activities.description: Changes the FM algorithms, from some generators over to a variety of wavetables.

activities.name: Change FM Operator
activities.description: Changes the FM Operator between a algorithms. Consult the manual for how they operate.

activities.name: Copy FM Operator
activities.description: Copies the selected FM operator to be pasted into another operator slot

activities.name: Paste FM Operator
activities.description: Pastes a prior copied FM operator into the current hovered column.

activities.name: Add Note
activities.description: With the cursor on top of a hypersynth note of a chord, adds a note into it.

activities.name: Change Chord
activities.description: With the cursor on the chord number, changes to another chord. Chords can be changed with the CRD command in a phrase or table.

activities.name: Copy Chord
activities.description: With the cursor on the chord, copies the chord into the clipboard

activities.name: Paste
activities.description: With the cursor on the chord, pastes the chord from the clipboard.

activities.name: Remove Note from Chord
activities.description: With the cursor on a hypersynth note, removes the note from the chord.

activities.name: Assign Touch-Axis to MIDI
activities.description: Assign the touchscreen axis to the selected parameter on any value with a visual slider. This can be leveraged to create assignments, that can be reassigned for internal MIDI.

activities.name: Assign Touch-Axis as MIDI to Parameter
activities.description: Assign the touchscreen axis to the selected parameter on any value with a visual slider. This can be leveraged to create assignments, that can be reassigned for internal MIDI.

activities.name: Name Instrument
activities.description: Naming the instrument by holding edit, navigating to the letter and releasing the edit key.

activities.name: Assign EQ
activities.description: With the cursor on the EQ, assigns an EQ bank to the instrument - which can be edited by pressing edit again

activities.name: Slow Move
activities.description: Moves the hovered marker slowly by time, independent from phrase length.

activities.name: Fast Move
activities.description: Moves the hovered marker quickly by time, independent from phrase length.

activities.name: Move 1 Step
activities.description: Moves 4 steps based on the tempo of the project.

activities.name: Move 4 Steps
activities.description: Moves 4 steps based on the tempo of the project.

activities.name: Move by Touch
activities.description: Moves the selected marker to the position where you touch the screen.

activities.name: Preview Sample
activities.description: Previews the sample, which can be used for lazy chopping

activities.name: Lazy Chop
activities.description: Inserts slice markers at the play head while previewing the sample.

activities.name: Record sample
activities.description: Records a sample. Use the ARM to set a minimum threshold before a recording starts.

activities.name: Delete Slice
activities.description: Delete a slice.

activities.description: Moves the cursor up or down, left or right

activities.description: The copied instrument is pasted into the current instrument slot. Release both buttons and repeat to undo.

activities.name: Assign Touch-Axis as MIDI to Parameter
activities.description: Assign the touchscreen axis to the selected parameter on any value with a visual slider. This can be leveraged to create assignments, that can be reassigned for internal MIDI.

activities.name: Assign Touch-Axis to MIDI
activities.description: Assign the touchscreen axis to the selected parameter on any value with a visual slider. This can be leveraged to create assignments, that can be reassigned for internal MIDI.
